resources.string: View the health of your loan
You can calculate the EMI, generate EMI schedules, run scenarios with rental options and generate yearly tax savings under section 24(b) along with your total cash outflow

Hello. Thank you for using my app. This is supposed to be an EULA. So here goes... \n I have created this app based on my knowledge of the current indian tax laws. While this knowledge is good, I am not an expert. I have tried to be as accurate as possible but there are rounding off errors, bugs and a not too comprehensive implementation of tax laws. So please use this app as a guidance and do not stake your life savings on it - I will not be responsible for any loss in any form. :-D
